mapper.sql: choice_id, choice_content, choice_first, choice_second, choice_third, choice_fourth, choice_answer, choice_difficulty, point, teacher_id, choice_time
mapper.select:
select
from choices where point in
'${item}'

select count(*) from choices ch left join teachers t on ch.teacher_id=t.teacher_id
and point=#{point}
mapper.insert: insert into choices (choice_id, choice_content, choice_first, choice_second, choice_third, choice_fourth, choice_answer, choice_difficulty teacher_id, choice_time) values (#{choice_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{choice_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choice_first,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choice_second,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choice_third,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choice_fourth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choice_answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choice_difficulty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{teacher_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choice_time,jdbcType=DATE})

choice_id,
choice_content,
choice_first,
choice_second,
choice_third,
choice_fourth,
choice_answer,
choice_difficulty,
point,

mapper.update:
update choices
choice_content = #{choice_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_first = #{choice_first,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_second = #{choice_second,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_third = #{choice_third,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_fourth = #{choice_fourth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_answer = #{choice_answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_difficulty = #{choice_difficulty,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
teacher_id = #{teacher_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_time = #{choice_time,jdbcType=DATE},
where choice_id = #{choice_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update choices set choice_content = #{choice_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_first = #{choice_first,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_second = #{choice_second,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_third = #{choice_third,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_fourth = #{choice_fourth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_answer = #{choice_answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_difficulty = #{choice_difficulty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_id = #{teacher_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_time = #{choice_time,jdbcType=DATE} where choice_id = #{choice_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
